name: Master Service Simulator
description:
Have you ever dreamed of establishing a Big Service Business in your city??!!
This Master Service Simulator game is perfect for you to make your dreams come true!!

in this game you can not only serve something, you will also open a mini cafe as your second income, so what are you waiting for??!! Hurry up, download this game and give any comments that are lacking from this game so that later the Game Developer will find out

This Game Made by Boba Team Studio

we Boba Team Studio will make games even more interesting in the future and of course Original from Boba Team Studio itself!! so Thanks for Downloading Our Game...
